places_with_reviews.name: Mayuka Family Restaurant
address: V4Q6+W5R, Alampur Rd, Alampur (P), Telangana 509152, India

reviews.text: Visited in Dec 2022, stayed in Haritha hotel - it had no restaurant then. This hotel was life saver - ate there 3 times every day. No fancy food, but reasonably clean, prompt service, friendly owner, decent tiffin & meals. Curd rice & Chicken Fry dinner was good. About 2 km before Haritha. Five star considering it is in Alampur.

Please note this is not a file functional restaurant for dinner. When we went this restaurant was not open. After we went there, the owner was called and he came in ten minutes and opened the restaurant. After which we were given food. So better to try to call ahead before going to save your time.
Meal is good. its veg restaurant. Fresh and Tasty food.

This place is like an oasis in the desert.

Hygiene meals, good ambience and great service staff make it totally worth a visit.

Washrooms could have been better.

Taste - 5/5
Ambience - 3/5
Price for Quality - 4/5

It's moderately good hotel. Also has AC section but we had lunch in non AC veg.

Cost around 90/- per one Veg meals. Quality and taste decent.

It's on main road to Jogulamba temple.

places_with_reviews.name: Padma Hotel & lodge

reviews.text:
Never judge a book by its cover.
Above quote absolutely suits this hotel, if you want to enjoy a homely food visit here. They serve good food, but the only problem is it's a small hotel, sitting option is limited.. takeaway is better option.

Had lunch of plate meals here. Very good taste. But no hygiene. They were serving food in steel plates which are washed and served to other people. And they are serving water in same steel glasses which are used by other people. I don't know if they wash plates properly or not.
Food is excellent, Village style veg-meals. Serving persons are very patiently serving food. Owner is good person. Amdience is little congested.
Good food, good service whatever u can get in a tourist place.

Affordable best food available here. Tiffin's( dosa, puri, idli etc) and tea available in mornings. Excellent meals( two curries, sambar, curd) available during lunch and dinner for 60 rupees.
Accommodation is also available here
This place also have car rentals for travelling
